node.title: Multiple Yale University Buildings Threatened With Bombs
node.alt: Multiple buildings on the campus of Yale University were evacuated Friday in the wake of a series of bomb threats.
node.description: The threats had targeted at least seven facilities across the Yale campus in New Haven, Connecticut.
node.content:
["Multiple buildings on the campus of Yale University were evacuated Friday in the wake of a series of bomb threats, New Haven, Connecticut, officials said.", "At least seven facilities had threats come in via the city's non-emergency phone line, according to emergency responders. New Haven Mayor Justin Elicker said that the threats were made just before 2 p.m. ET.", "\"We take these threats very, very seriously,\" Elicker told the media. \"Clearly we are looking to track down the individual who made this call.\"", "", "
Multiple buildings on the campus of Yale University were evacuated Friday in the wake of a series of bomb threats.
", "The threats provoked a massive law enforcement response from a variety of agencies, including the New Haven Police Department and Yale Police Department.", "In the wake of the threats, numerous businesses and buildings on the Yale campus and in the surrounding New Haven downtown area were evacuated. Police have not yet cleared any buildings for re-entry, and authorities stated that the area would remain closed off for a \"couple hours.\"", "The on-campus evacuations included a number of high-profile buildings related to the university, including the University Theater, Yale Art Gallery, and numerous educational buildings and libraries.", "The area in which the threats were targeted, known as the Old Campus, has been closed off to all pedestrian and vehicle traffic.", "This is a breaking story and will be updated with additional information."]
